title: Configuration file failure - Nightly 1.77.2
author: pauldurham
body_snippet:
I resumed configuring my list of folders & servers after hibernating my PC.  I made many changes, saved the config (ctrl-S), and exited.  I re-opened mRemoteNG & the entire configuration was gone. I was prompted to create a configuration as if I was a first-time user.

## Expected Behavior
I expected the configuration to be saved and available at the app's next startup.

## Current Behavior
The config was lost.  Everything was gone.  This happened only once so far.

## Steps to Reproduce...

comments.snippet:
You stated that you saved the configuration in another folder. Did it disappear with the hibernation or not? 
If it persisted, did you try opening it manually through the menu?
comments.author: simonai1254

comments.snippet: After I realised the config was gone, I checked the 2nd folder where I manually exported the config - the "export" was missing from there too.  I can only assume it never actually performed the export.
comments.author: pauldurham
